entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:08 AM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 08:08 AM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023
